message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product.
I understand you're looking to spend a bit less, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $110.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice. How about we settle on $105? It's a fair price for both of us.
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I'm willing to give a bit more. I'm now offering the product to you for $108.
